name: Robotmessenger.org
short_description:
RobotMessenger.org is a instant messenger application kernel created to handle with all complexities of a instant messenger application, managing multiple profiles, plugins and filters with stability, scalability and performance.

RobotMessenger.org is a service capable to interact with any user interface created to control it.

Part of RobotMessenger.org codebase is based on it's parent project, PlanetaMessenger.org reached at http://sourceforge.net/projects/planeta
